<p><a href="http://bit.ly/1wPad4i"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/50068aabbb63bba470d28a237819e83a/tumblr_inline_nc6a8tsEqA1rr2wit.jpg"/></a></p>

<p>Do you like explosions? Sure, we all do! You may enjoy <a href="http://bit.ly/1wPad4i"><strong>THIS</strong></a> example of 0.25’s new, glorious explosion fx. You may also enjoy the big secret that will be revealed on next week’s <a href="http://bit.ly/1knMaSg"><strong>EPISODE</strong></a>…</p>

Yes, finally!

Do they scale to the amount of fuel that is in the part too? Those NASA parts had pathetic explosions.
Nice, New explosions! Look awesome!

Yes, finally!

Do they scale to the amount of fuel that is in the part too? Those NASA parts had pathetic explosions.

Oh, I really hope so!
Wow! This'll make crashing a lot more fun!

Clicked the thread thinking it was going to be an update announcement... Only slightly a little bit disappointed, those are some awesome explosion effects!

Edit: post unclear; should have said THE update announcement...

Edited September 20, 2014 by hawkinator
This update is gonna be really... Impactful!
I'll admit it, that brought a tear to my eye. It was just so beautiful.
gif pls :3. Awesome.
It sparkles!!!!!
Ooh, shiny.
I'm gonna enjoy every single failure sooo much.

Those look so beautiful! Oh my goodness!

All aboard the Mun HypeTrain SD70ACe to go back to Kerbin to board the hypetrain pulled by the HypeUnion Pacific 844! (Sorry, the amount of amazement with this release has left me speechless

Here's a gif of the explosion: http://gifmaker.cc/PlayGIFAnimation.php?folder=20140919127XPSPhBgR9tKoOuDnP735K&file=output_MGJdM6.gif

Slower version: http://gifmaker.cc/PlayGIFAnimation.php?folder=20140919127XPSPhBgR9tKoOuDnP735K&file=output_W5pEyy.gif

EDIT: Note how this is the stock albatross and it has the SP+ wing textures.

EDIT: Note how this is the stock albatross and it has the SP+ wing textures.

Nice catch. Let's hope it also has the stock mid-wing CoL...

oopsmahbad

Edited September 20, 2014 by Kerbies_are_my_Minions

I CALLED IT!!!!

thank you precognitive abilities *pats head* at least i know this won't be the last thing i will predict....

Here's a gif of the explosion: http://gifmaker.cc/PlayGIFAnimation.php?folder=20140919127XPSPhBgR9tKoOuDnP735K&file=output_MGJdM6.gif

Slower version: http://gifmaker.cc/PlayGIFAnimation.php?folder=20140919127XPSPhBgR9tKoOuDnP735K&file=output_W5pEyy.gif

EDIT: Note how this is the stock albatross and it has the SP+ wing textures.

Also notice the Mk1 jet fuel tanks have a new texture.

AWESOME! I am going to crash so many cluster bombs now.

This still isn't the secret feature though. They already announced explosions a while back, secret feature is something different...
I can already see all the future danny2462/xactar videos benefiting from this

Wow! This'll make crashing a lot more fun!

Sadly im not sure that's the type of crashing done by the x64 version... Unless... this is how they plan to "fix" that?

Sadly im not sure that's the type of crashing done by the x64 version... Unless... this is how they plan to "fix" that?

Except it's your computer that does it. In real life.

*sniff* It's beautiful! I cannot wait to fail now!

Jebediah: "Hooah, let's light this candle!"

:( *Bob and Bill back away slowly.*

I think my road train will have a new utility now:

Another image(more formal):

Oh, and if you're wondering: the truck contain the equivalent of 4 of those big SLS tank(Kerbodyne S3-14400) plus a 3/4 orange tank.

(there is also the 150 litres of liquid fuel tank but it's used for the truck* and it's insignificant compared to the rest)

*I use the Multiwheel mod so, with the type of engine I used for the truck, I need liquid fuel to drive the truck.

PS: when I said that it would have it's utility, I meant, of course, that I will crash it on any building I find just to see the explosions!.

I made a quick test, and nearly all the tanks have been destroyed(the game crashed before I could have a precise number, but my estimation is that only one tank would have survived)! Can't wait the 0.25!!!

THIS WILL BE AWESOME!

also, if anyone want the truck, I can give the .craft file I can provide it. it only need two mods for that:T's Modular MultiWheels and Magic Smoke Industries Infernal Robotics

Edited September 20, 2014 by goldenpeach
Time to exercise one of my greatest skills in KSP, makin' stuff 'splode.
